data.text:
This was our 8th stay at Regency Plaza Aqua Park and yet again it exceeded all our expectations. The hotel has extensive well kept landscape gardens, several clean pools, large beach with comfortable sunbeds and several restaurants. Our seaview room was large, well cleaned with tea/coffee making facilities and daily bottles of water.

We were treated like royalty from arrival to departure. Outstanding and professional service from Hossam at front office and many laughs with Mustafa and Ayman (FO).  Food in the buffet restaurants has massively improved, thank you to Chef Mohamed Moustafa for seeing to all our needs. 
F&B staff from waiters to managers very efficient and hard working especially the bar waiters on the terrace on an evening. Baher in royal restaurant very polite and solves any problems. Staff went above and beyond to ensure we had another memorable stay.

Have seen many positive improvements the last few years and extremely pleased to see the Ivory buffet restaurant open again.

We look forward to our next visit from Nicky, Viv and Frank
data.title: 8th visit and will be returning. Highly recommend

data.text: Fab service at Pizza Resraurant by Reda.   Welcome with a smile perfect spot to drop by for lunch or drinks.   Variety of pizzas pasta and drinks. Friendly staff and lovely location with a calm surrounding with lovely view .  Fab for families and couples alike
data.title: Regency Plaza Pizza Restaurant

data.text: We booked a deluxe poolside room, but upgraded to Royal level on arrival. It was the best move ever made. You are literally treated like Royalty. The staff are amazing and looked after you like family. They couldn't do enough for you, were kind courteous & helpful. The hotel itself is set in beautiful gardens that are kept immaculate. The pools are clean & refreshing. The beach is easily accessible, with a pier to walk to snorkelling in the amazing Red Sea. The rooms are spacious, clean & comfortable. The food selection is more than generous, with several restaurants, pizzarias & snack bars to chose from. The staff are the jewel in the crown. Thank you all for making our stay amazing. We will be back, & heartily recommend the Regency Plaza Royal level to anyone wanting to be treated like a fellow human being. With kindness & warmth.
data.title: A simply amazing experience.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for leaving your opinion. We are glad that your stay was successful. We will continue to strive for a better level for every customer's satisfaction. If you have any advice or suggestion, we would be grateful for your contact by email: guestcontact@regencyplazasharm.net
owner_response.author: Guest Relation

data.text:
We stayed at the Regency Plaza for a week. It’s a great value for money, but more of a 3 star hotel in my opinion. 

Few people that deserve a mention - Baseem, who runs the pizza pasta restaurant, Himda, our waiter in the main restaurant, provided exceptional service with a friendly smile, making every meal a pleasure. And Tehe, the lifeguard at the kids' pool, very friendly guy.
Also special mention to Fabi, the barman from pool bar - great cocktails!

The hotel is generally clean, looked after and everyone is very polite. Food in the buffet restaurant is okay, can get a bit boring but there are plenty of choices a short walk from the hotel - Arab Bucks was our favourite.

I would advise not to buy anything from the guests jewellery shop. The prices are way too high, much better choice at the Soho square and reasonable prices. Luckily we didn’t buy anything from the hotel shop, but the price difference was quite significant on the same watch…! 

Our overall stay at Regency Plaza was really pleasant, thanks to the outstanding staff and amenities.
data.title: Great family holiday

data.text: It’s our third time here I fell like home I can’t go anywhere else every thing we need is here all stuff want give any help very nice people beach and swimming pools are great my husband was sick and they looked after us very well Ramy is an amazing helpful person all staff are so nice very nice room and clean we will be back with all my family
data.title: Home ❤️
